item.title: #TIL : Build lightweight image by using multistage
item.description: Build lightweight image by using multistage Docker is great tool to build a pull-n-run application. But sometimes, your image will be large if you build image from a big base image which has heavy compliling toolbox.

item.title: #TIL : Ansible running host pattern
item.description: Ansible running host pattern Ansible supports pattern to select and filter running hosts from all hosts.

item.title: #TIL : Reduce init time MySQL docker image
item.description: Reduce init time MySQL docker image Original MySQL docker image uses a script to generate ssl certificates for service.

item.title: #TIL : Using netcat to wait a TCP service
item.description: Using netcat to wait a TCP service When doing a CI/CD testing, you would need to connect a external service (RDBMS, HTTP server or generic TCP server service).

item.title: #TIL : Free sandbox server for development
item.description: Free sandbox server for development We can use Heroku as a forever-free sandbox solution for testing or hosting micro service.

item.title: #TIL : Checking forced push conflicts on source code in auto testing
item.description: Checking forced push conflicts on source code in auto testing Using automated CI solution likes Travis, Jenkins, DroneCI, … is good solution to ensure quality of software and no breaks in deployment.

item.title: Kick start Docker environment on ubuntu
item.description: What does script do : Install latest Docker Engine Install latest Docker Compose tool AND last but not least, a congratuation message !

item.title: Kick start a LEMP stack on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: LEMP = Linux + EngineX(NginX) + MySQL + PHP Too tired for doing same tasks over and over again.

item.title: How to reload gracefully supervisor program
item.description: Problem We have some managed worker-programs by supervisor. While deploying new codebase of worker, we have to restart them to update new logic.
